values: Every Promise Is Yes in Him: The Privilege and Power of Union with ChristEvery Promise Is Yes in Him: The Privilege and Power of Union with Christ

Apart from union with Christ, we would have no access to God’s promises and no reason to rejoice in affliction. But in Christ, every promise of God is Yes.Apart from union with Christ, we would have no access to God’s promises and no reason to rejoice in affliction. But in Christ, every promise of God is Yes.
